actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

official_title: A resolution notifying the House of Representatives of the election of Robert C. Byrd, a Senator from the State of West Virginia, as President pro tempore.

summary.text: Notifies the House of Representatives of the election of Senator Robert C. Byrd as President pro tempore of the Senate.

titles.title: A resolution notifying the House of Representatives of the election of Robert C. Byrd, a Senator from the State of West Virginia, as President pro tempore.
